desc: Shop at Grifiti - Our Silicone Rubber Band Joes can be used for: Cooking, Board Games, Boxes Outdoor Sports, Pen Loops, and Wallets. If you need a tablet stand, use your Nootle to hold an iPad, iPhone, or camera easily. For comfort at your desk, try our Wrist Rests, MacBook Palm Pads, or our Travel Lap Desks.

layout.text: Silicone bands wrap up just about anything.
